# Desobfuscation Techniques for VBS Files

{{#include ../../../banners/hacktricks-training.md}}

Some things that could be useful to debug/deobfuscate a malicious VBS file:

## echo

```bash
Wscript.Echo "Like this?"
```

## Commnets

```bash
' this is a comment
```

## Test

```bash
cscript.exe file.vbs
```
